name: Turnover
description: Knock a Cryo Slime out of the hands of a Cryo Hilichurl Grenadier.

name: Tear Down This Wall!
description: Destroy an Ice Shieldwall Mitachurl's shield.

name: No Ice for Me, Thanks
description: Defeat a Cryo Samachurl before it is able to create an ice pillar.

name: ...The Harder They Fall
description: Destroy a Cryo Samachurl's ice pillar.

name: Chilly-Churl
description: Defeat a Frostarm Lawachurl before its Infused Form can expire.

name: "Rosebud..."
description: Break a Cryo Cicin Mage's shield.

name: Assassin of Kings
description: Defeat the true ruler of Dragonspine?

name: David and Goliath
description: Paralyze a Ruin Grader by attacking its weak point.
